articles.description: In a statement,  he did not say he was refusing it or name Mr Trump, but mentioned the "tragic events of last week".

articles.title: Canterbury Bulldogs reportedly part ways with chief executive Andrew Hill - NEWS.com.au
articles.description: Canterbury Bulldogs reportedly part ways with chief executive Andrew Hill
articles.content: Canterbury Bulldogs chief executive Andrew Hill has reportedly been handed his marching orders from his position at the club.As first revealed by The Daily Telegraph’s Michael Carayannis, Hill and th… [+2787 chars]
